extDescription.message: This extension provides you the UI to use Google URL Shortener quickly.

optDontShowMsgLogin.message: Don't show the message after logged in to Google.

optDontShowMsgCopyClipboard.message: Don't show the message after copied the shortened URL to the clipboard using the context menu.

optDontShowMsgRegisterReadItLater.message: Don't show messages after registering a URL to Pocket using the context menu.

optDontStartWatching.message: Don't start watching automatically when the URL is shortened.

optShortenDirectlyAtNotLogin.message: Shorten the URL directly at clicking the extension button in NOT logged in.

optShortenDirectlyAtLogin.message: Shorten the URL directly at clicking the extension button in logged in.

optTweetAtShortenByContextMenu.message: When you shorten URL by the context menu, display the window to post to Twitter automatically.

optTweetAtShortenByPopup.message: When you shorten URL by the pop-up window, display the window to post to Twitter automatically.

optFacebookAtShortenByContextMenu.message: When you shorten URL by the context menu, display the window to post to Facebook automatically.

optFacebookAtShortenByPopup.message: When you shorten URL by the pop-up window, display the window to post to Facebook automatically.

optTwitterSetTitle.message: Set the title of the current tab when tweet.

optAmazonShortUrl.message: Adopt a short URL to an item page.

optWatchingDontStartWatchingAtCheckHighP.message: Don't start the watching automatically when you display URL shortening on a priority basis.

optAdoptLinkUrlContextMenu.message: Shorten the link URL instead the page URL, if clicking the context menu on the link.

popupLoginDesc.message: If you want to check your history, please login and authorize to Google.

popupRegisteredReadItLater.message: The URL has been registered to Pocket.

ctxmenuLogin.message: Login to Google (for recording to history)

notifyCompleteLogin.message: Authentication completed. Shorten URL will be recorded to your history.
